title: i cannot click left button in order for me to use the map /shop /items ....
body: everything works fine ,except for the left button ,it works in the menu ,i can buy with it items (once i open the store by click "p" ) but i cannot open the shop by clicking or to click the map ,any ideas ?:)

replies.body: Can you open the shop by tapping P on the keyboard?  You may also have mini map clicking disabled, which you can toggle back on through the in-game interface options.  If these don't solve your issue, please try using another mouse.  This can help us rule out possibilities.  Let me know!
